review:
this is my second controller i am presently using the logitech 310 which is
very comfortable and a top notch product beats any controller at any time. so
before reviewing i just wanted to give a context as to what redgear was up
against. and after doing intense gameplays including fifa, need for speed, far
cry i must say red gear performs well. people have been saying about
connectivity issues, i found none a great wireless controller for the price.  
i want to point out that this controller is not very comfortable for playing
fifa at a stretch i found this during marathon gameplays with my buddies since
there is no rubberised thumb grips on the analog sticks, which was there on
the logitech one.  
next the build quality was very good for the redgear.  
battery backup was just awsm.  
  
i got this one only for the convenience that a wireless gamepad has over their
wired counterpart i.e. in my case logitech. by no means i found any latency
issue with redgear the gameplays were smooth and precise. only down point is
the non rubberised analog thumb grips over all this is an amazing controller
and i cant recommend them enough. definately buy this one.  
and one more thing try to go for the dual dongle one as its the same price,
plus you get a back up dongle which many of you will definitely like. hope you
guys find this useful as i tend to research my purchase before i get one.  
so after gaming for some more time i noticed something(the thumb grips were
too slippery so i added hot glue it also prevents the flaking of the rubber on
the grips) but that is very minute and i fixed it using some hot glue and its
perfect now no need to buy thumb grips now. see the pics to get the idea.

================  
INTRODUCTION :-  
================  
Gamepad has become quite an essential requirement for gaming. Every Pro gamer
must require to master this technology. To fulfill the need RedGear has
launched its own series of gamepad. Though most of their gamepad are worth
buying but nothing beats the ease and comfort of this gamepad.  
The product is not new but still it is one of its best in its series. I have
tried many other gamepad but nothing beats this gamepad. The product give its
best in its price range. It gives an edge over most of its competitors at the
same price range.  
  
This controller goes after the Xbox360 design, so casual gamers who are on a
tight budget can enjoy an alternative gamepad with a price tag of Rs.999  
  
================  
BOX CONTENTS :-  
================  
• Gamepad.  
  
• Micro USB cable.  
  
• Driver Cd.  
  
• A Quick Manual.  
  
• USB receiver.  
  
========  
PROS:-)  
========  
• Cheaper than the Xbox360.  
  
• It is wireless.Clutter free.  
  
• Excelent Range.  
  
• Average Battery life.  
  
• Xinput controller.  
  
========  
CONS:-(  
========  
• Multiple wireless device on the same frequency disturbs the signal resulting
in laggy gameplay.  
  
• No bluetooth, so android phones will need an OTG.  
  
• Service Centers are in limited regions.  
  
• No application to change the sensitivity of the LT and RT buttons.  
  
• Micro USB provided is only for charging purposes. You cannot use it in Wired
Mode.  
=============  
FEAUTURES :-  
=============  
One of the many things I love about this controller is that it not only looks
like an Xbox360, it is an Xinput controller, where your PC detects it as a
typical xbox controller, so you dont need to configure using 3rd party
applications to fool your gaming rig that it is an Xbox controller.  
  
==================  
WIRELESS RANGE :-  
==================  
Yes it is wireless using RF signals at 2.4 ghz no bluetooth so it isnt exactly
a solo device. You need to hook it up with a USB receiver. The Range is
exceptional for users who want to buy this for a couch play in your mancave or
living room. But tends to lag in gameplay when you have multiple wireless
device using the same frequency causing signal interference.  
  
===============  
BATTERY LIFE :-  
===============  
The company says 10 hours. Now i havent been able to test that but for casual
gamers such as me, i charge it after 3 days with 2 hours of gameplay under the
belt.  
  
The charging is done by a Micro Usb cable with a duration of 6 hours for a
full charge. The LED indicator flashes in charging mode and shows no light
when its full.  
  
Can we play it in WIRED MODE?  
Sadly you cant. The gamepad only accepts the cable for charging not for wired
gaming.  
  
==========================  
DESIGN AND BUILD QUALITY :-  
==========================  
• The gamepad is is of hard plastic with rubberized grips on both ends of the
gamepad, suitable for persons with sweaty palms.  
  
• The X,Y,A,B keys, Dpad, analogue stick all resemble the Xbox360 controller.  
  
• The vibration is moderate but not at all disappointing. Although its
essential that you have to install the Driver that came along with the Disk.  
  
• The button press feedback is crisp and on the lighter side. However the
rubber on the analogue stick has an off chance to wear off with consistent  
gaming so i suggest to buy thumb grips for longer life.  
  
• The Dpad could have been improved with a round layout to actually feel that
you are pressing two buttons for a bidirection control.  
  
• The LED indicator shows you whether it is Xinput mode or Dinput mode.  
  
• The turbo mode here is a toggle button which enables you to simulate rapid
button presses that you can customize on which button you need to  
do.  
  
• The X,Y,A,B buttons are backlited.  
  
==========  
VERDICT :-  
==========  
If you are looking for budget friendly gamepad, then look nowhere else. I am
pretty sure it won't disappoint you. Though it will not give you the Feel of
premium gamepad, but getting one for third price with just one or two less
features, is a brilliant buy.  
  
It requires xinput to give vibration feedback. The R3/L3 click button feedback
is not so good. But no complaints for the cost effective controller.  
  
[...]  
.  
&  
.  
You owe me a Smile :-)

For the price this comes in I would say it's not the cheapest but it is worth
it. If u want a controller which is Xbox kind go for it. The keys are super
good except the ones which are labelled as LB, RB ( These are good for usage
but for longer play time I would suggest u change your game controls for
better experience). Next the haptic feedback is great and for the price this
comes in u cannot expect any more. I got this in a deal for rs 1100.
Ergonomics are top notch and the grip layer in the palm support is like icing
on the cake. Battery backup is great with very low charge time. This product
comes with 1 year warranty for manufacturing defects so this ensures your
investment. If you are a game enthusiast and is looking for a gamepad just
grab it and you won't regret your purchase. It works on both Android phones
via an OTG cable and on computers with a quick paring dongle. It comes with
lights and different modes which help significantly.

Bought it for 999 which was pretty amazing deal and as was the product. Works
very fine and is the best in available price range.

Good quality gamepad. looks solid and premium. Redgear pro gamepad is best
option available right now for budget wireless gamepad. it's take 2 hours to
fully charge. In just single charge its giving me more then 10-12 hours of
battery backup. So Battery backup is amazing.  
  
Regear pro gamepad is made for windows OS but you can also use this gamepad in
android phones as well. But i try this gamepad in 3 android phone and its only
working in 1 phone. This gamepad is perfectly working in Redmi note 4 but in
stock android phone (Lenovo K8 Note, Lenovo K8 Plus) this gamepad is not
working! check out my full review video on YouTube for more info!  
  
If you like my review click on Helpful Button!  
Check Out Full Video Review On My YouTube Channel!  
Link In The Bio!  
Thanks!

I gifted this to my boyfriend on his birthday. I don't know anything about
gaming. The last game that I played was actually Snake Xenia on a Nokia phone.
Games make me nervous, probably because my hand-eye coordination sucks. Then
again, my boyfriend is a gaming addict. I somehow accessed his Amazon account
and saw his wishlist. I saw this baby as one of the things he wanted. It was
in my budget and since it was on his wishlist, I assumed that he would like
it. Thereafter, I ordered this from my Amazon account. How did it end? He
loved it and he couldn't believe that I could give him something that would
make his gaming time more enjoyable. He is happy. So, I am happy. How bou dah?

I was looking for a good pc controller for quite some time now. Finally bought
this on the recommendation of a friend. A wired xbox controller is more
expensive than this. Plugged in the dongle and it connected within 3 seconds
with my windows 8.1 laptop.  
  
Feels good to hold. Good plastic on the analog sticks. The shoulder buttons
are great and snappy. They are just the right amount of hardness. The face
buttons have the same tactile feedback of the xbox controllers. Button mashing
goodness.  
  
A full 5 on 5 rating from me. Once I've spent more time using this controller
I'll update this review with comments on battery life and wireless
connectivity. Till then, dear redgear, please keep making more of these value
for money products.

Those who have Sony W800D tv...this is your must have accessory... played
asphalt 8 past two days... working smooth...  
Got it for 1150 from seller Appario.. prompt delivery 👍🏼  
Don't know why they are selling it for 1600...waited few weeks for it's price
to drop...some lucky people got it for 999...  
I don't have much RAM & graphics in my pc... So I'm playing games like
assassin's Creed black flag & gta sa..  
Thank you Red gear for additional dongle...  
When its price falls below 1200..don't give a second thought...

The controller works like a charm with windows PC, all the xbox games for pc
can be played and feels pretty good experience.  
It is only for Windows PC, although it supports Android but there aren't any
proper games that are compatible with these controllers and for sony android
tv the range is not enough as the receiver goes to the back of your tv so it
just decreases the connectivity and rarely works.  
I am writing this review after around 3 weeks of usage.  
I feel at this price point this the best you can get.  
Don't worry about the quality its good and satisfying.

Totally worth the money. In fact, it is better in comparison with the more
expensive controllers from Logitech. Since it is a Xbox 360 imitation, the
ergonomics, more or less, remain the same. Build quality is surprisingly good
for an imitation and hope it doesn't break down any time soon. In a nutshell,
this is a very good wireless controller and if you are looking for one without
having the means to dish out 3-6 thousand rupees for a original Xbox 360 or
Xbox One wireless controller, I would suggest buying this controller.

review:
I have two of these game pad now for two player game.  
  
pros  
1) robust. dropped twice from 3 feet and nothing happened. works well as
before.  
2) very responsive. Never felt lag while playing the game  
3) Turbo button cool to cheat in some games. Also many buttons can be made
turbo at the same time.  
4) Able to connect 2 Redgear Pro wireless game pad to computer to play 2
player games  
5) Never felt to recharge batteries during game play. usually play for 2 hours
and then mostly it is on charge.  
  
cons  
1) Weighs ~215g. Little heavier on hand.  
2) In one of the game pad, need to press D-pad little harder. Not a big
problem though.  
3) since D-Pad is not circular, pressing diagonally is little cumbersome. Need
to practice to press diagonally.  
4) observed that the game pad can attach to both the wireless receiver. There
can be confusion on what Gamepad is player 1 and player 2. The issue is only
during power-up and hence not a big problem either.  
5) One of the usb receiver didn't work more than a meter. Since I have 4 usb
receivers now, tried another one and now both the game pad works across the
living room. Since one receiver was defective knocked of one star from rating.

Best controller I've used so far and works like a boss. The grip is amazing,
is smooth and doesn't require a driver except for the vibration for which a CD
is provided. It's just too cool!! And the delivery was extremely fast.

Firstly, great service by Amazon. The product came in a well packaged
container.  
  
Now about the controller. If you're reading this to confirm about the working
of the controller, well I'll help you out.  
Just like you, I too read comments/reviews continuously to see if it's worth
the buy. So after much thought i bought it and boy it was the right call. The
controller has in built xinput which makes the game realize the controller as
an Xbox controller. You can switch between xinput and direct input. For direct
input you'll have to install certain drivers which can be done with the disc
provided. For xinput, it's just plug and play.  
  
The buttons are well recognised and there is no lag for Windows 10.  
  
I bought the dual dongle version so there are two dongles. You have to be
careful where you place them because you can lose them easily and there are no
spares available and cannot be bought separately.  
  
It has lithium battery which is rechargeable with the usb cable provided.  
  
So final rating  
  
Looks - 8  
working - 10  
Over all experience - 9  
  
So just over the fear and order the damn thing. you won't regret it

review:
Its built quality is very good, battery lasts long enough to play and get
tired.  
Switches are very good to press and responsive although I was charging this
with a phone charger and after a month whenever I used to remove from
charging, the lights blinks showing its battery low so I had to off the
controller and keep it for some time to use it.  
Overall its very good to use.

I have purchased so many gamepad before but this is best for pc gaming ,
prices is 3 times higher than normal pc gamepads but quality is 10 times
better that normal gamepad so don't even think to buy quantum , other gamepad
who cost you below 1k .  
  
I really want to thank you Amazon for delivery at night also (9:30pm ) as i
requested u to deliver asap .

I was wishing that anyone would create a xbox styled controller for PS3, Came
a controller from 'REDGEAR'. The controller was amazing for Ps3 but i don't
know about PC, but have to try it on PC. A single issue with this Product in
using on Ps3, it takes lotta/lots of time to get turned on.but except this,
everything was fine. Once again thanks to Amazon for Packaging process.

It's a good gamepad. I won't say the best but it's really a good investment at
this price. It doesn't require 2 dongles but the other one is just a spare.
One little hiccup is the lack of explanation of the led indicators during
charging and battery status. Other than that, it's a good product. Btw, amazon
delivered it within 2 days in top condition. So, a very good job by amazon
too...

Analog sticks are smooth, but a bit short makes it hard to aim precisely.
Battery backup is good. Sometimes one of the USB dongles gets disconnected and
then pointer starts drifting in one direction, you have to remove and replug
them, then it starts working again.  
All in all good controller for casual and adventure games, but not for FPS.
Good for Rs.999.

review:
Due to some medical issues (which I am not disclosing here) doctors have
suggested me to have bed rest. I ordered this wireless gamepad in order to
play PC gamed while laying down. Thank God I am made this purchase and now I
am having good time in spite of my disease.  
  
Pros :-  
* Good build quality.  
* Proper touch of a X-Box 360 controller.  
* Long distance coverage.  
* Good battery life.  
* Nicely designed.  
* Firm grip.  
* Wireless (of course)  
* Extra dongle included in the box.  
* Automatically switches after 5-10mins of inactivity (saves battery life).  
* Plug & Play  
* Zero delay in connectivity.  
  
Cons :-  
* Slightly heavy.  
* Some buttons make noises on continuous stroke.  
* Some games are not supported.

The build quality is good but it doesn't support 70% games on both pc and
android. Even though it doesn't support many games it has a good battery
backup. It works almost 6 hours on single charge

just had one wireless control, I needed one more wireless control. So I was
looking for another one so I put in search bar xbox 360 wireless control and
guess what I got this redgear pro. Unfortunately I fell ill as soon as it
arrived because there's this virus going on in Hyderabad the kids, their
parents, my parents and I. So we couldn't check it on time! Now when we're
fine my brother checked and said it's not working! But we were late in
returning! But that's amazon's fault it should not come up in the search
results when I put xbox360 wireless control! You try it it will be second!

I bought this gamepad for Rs. 1299. In that range, it is perhaps the best
looking wireless gamepad. It looks like a xbox controller and it surely
impressed my friends while i was playing with it. So if looks is your
criteria, then you should definitely go for it.  
Now coming to the performance, I played Batman Arkham asylum,Rise of the Tomb
raider, NFS MW,WWE2k16 etc and it performed quite well. Although I feel that
the vibrations are on the lower side and there is no way you can control the
amount of vibration you want, which according to me was a con. Apart from
that, it is a very good joypad.  
The only thing i am worried about is the servicing if i need it. Dont know is
readgear has any service centers for repairing gamepads.

Full plastic body. Response is good. A little rubberized at the side of grips.
Charges very fast. Feels nice. Detects instantly. Software cd included but
doesn't need installation in win 10. Overall good product in 1k.

Its perfect. Charge it, play with it, that too all at once! Have fun with it.
Just remember to buy it during offers, the price goes as low as 800rs. Buy it
blindly.

Controller is attractive and all but the levers have failed in just a month..
I would not recommend this item if you are going to use it regularly.
Unsatisfactory.

This is a well built, sturdy device that holds up very well for extended
gaming and has no issues with connectivity. I considered the steam controller
and the xbox controller before making this purchase, and having used all major
console controllers in the past, i can say that the redgear holds itself up
very well to the competition, especially given that it is a fourth of the
price of the others, Usage times over the last month has given me about 8 to
10 hours of gameplay between charges. The build quality is sturdy and feels
reassuring, while remaining light enough to avoid fatigue. Connectivity is
instant with simple plug and play enough to get one started.

Good Product compatible with android windows and mac wirelessly

keys and joysticks. The packaging was good and delivery was really amazing.  
Since it is wireless it has some amount of lag to it and sometimes when the
frequency of pressing is really high, the keys won't respond but that doesn't
make a huge amount of difference, more like it's good for most of the first
person shooters and other games but definitely a no for games like cuphead.  
the best thing about controller is it's Xbox compatibility in almost every
game and the back lit keys.  
At this price it's definitely worth it.

cheap and best controller for PC. Comes with charging cable worth 100Rs and
rechargable batteries inbuilt ( 200-300 Rs)  
I am putting these because XBOX 360 without above comes at base price of 3k
and you can buy 3 of these in that price.  
Anyway in festive sale time price goes to low as 1k for double dongle version.  
I have bought 3 of these for playing party couch co-op games on windows 10 (
i5 +8G + 2G graphics + 256SSD ) with friends and family.  
Nidhogg2, Duck Game, ultimate ChickenHorse, Shift Happens, Don't starve
together , Ibb and Obb, Worms Armageddon, Worms WMD  
Lovers in a dangerous spacetime, Little Big planet, Cuphead, Castle Crashers.

This is the best wireless controller you can ever get at this price. It's been
almost 1 and a half month since I purchased it and I haven't even charged it
for once. The battery backup is extremely good I can say here. I play games
for like 2-3 hours a day and it was shocking to see that when it had been 1
month since I used it, it was still working without even charging it for once.
Really impressed.

Awesome controller with excellent built quality and no problem in
connectivity, connected to my windows 10 machine in no time. The controller is
recognized as Xbox 360 controller hence support most of the games. Battery
back is also excellent 6-7 hours of runtime in a single charge. Didn't expect
much from this brand but was amazed with its product quality. Definitely worth
the money for those who want budget controller.

A very decent controller for PC. Mine just last for ~5 months 'cause RT key
broke internally due to little rough use. Battery backup is good as compared
to other controllers. Texture, look and feel is quite nice for ~1500 RS... If
you play The Witcher 3 then please don't go for this one, buy Xbox one
wireless instead.  
TL;DR A decent product, not recommended for daily gamers...

It is replica of Xbox 360 controller  
Nice inhand feel, illuminated keys are good

Awesome value for money product for basic gamers.  
GO FOR IT

Link your Adhar Card to This controller Before You Play
Five Stars
review:
I've been using it for a year now and I believe I can give a pretty fair
review for this product. Got it for ₹999 :P  
  
Connectivity: Super fast (1-2 seconds), atleast 5 meters  
  
Material: Sturdy Built (can bear multiple drops easily from 3-4 feets)  
  
Accuracy: No issues regarding accuracy  
  
Comfort: I've played for hours continuously (whole night) and never felt a
thing. Also, the buttons A B X Y glow constantly so that's an added advantage.  
  
Compatibility: Plays almost all the modern games built for playing via remote
control like GTA 5, Witcher 3, Max Payne 3, Battlefield 1, Just Cause 3,
Prototype 2 etc.  
Also, I've tested it on PS3 and Android, apart from laptop and pc, they work
like a charm.  
  
Backup: If you have no life i.e. play all week (7 days) for 4-5 hours daily,
you'll probably have to recharge it twice or maybe thrice which I believe is
very good.  
  
There is no downside to buying it.  
Although the receiver I received with it broke so I bought another one for 99
from Amazon itself. It's rarely available.  
It's so good that I own two of them now.  
  
At this price, it's a steal :P

The best controller in price. Working is smooth and battery backup is also
good. Vibration motors are perfect. And I like its illuminated XYAB keys.
Works in both dinput and xinput mode.

I would like to recommend this wireless game pad, it worked on my android TV
as well as my Computer, its simply awesome, its battery backup is insane.

Best Gamepad at this rate. Fit and feels good on hand. Nice controller for
Rocket League. Build quality is awesome. Rubber on the sides gives perfect
grip. Turbo button is really helpful. Works not only on laptop/PC but also on
Android Phones (via OTG). Power back up is good. Force Feedback works perfect.

Just recieved the product... Build quality look premium Af... Looks really
awesome... Works perfectly fine... I recommend it.. Go for it.. Worth its..
Played 2k18 works fine.. Just plug and play...

Used on a Win 10 Laptop.  
  
Very good purchase. Worth every bit of the 1500 I spent on this. I usually
game by connecting my laptop up to the TV and it has been a blessing to play
wirelessly. Gives me a solid 6-8 hour gaming time. Charges pretty quickly.
Both joysticks are premium. Slightly on the tougher side of build, so it's
durable but I did feel my palms starting to ache after some intense sessions.
The buttons are a tad bit overly clicky. I don't mind the sound but vs the
Xbox One controller you'll take some time to get used to it. I rarely use the
D-Pad but it has worked well too.  
  
Connectivity is good. Didn't require any driver installation just plugged in
the dongle and was set from the moment I unboxed it. The bone I'd have to pick
is probably the lack of a storage space for the Bluetooth dongle. It's pretty
small but is always an inconvenience to keep it always plugged in. If you have
a small sleeve in your Laptop bag which can house the small USB dongle, then
you're set. It is easy to lose but can't be too unhappy about it. Great
product. Would recommend.

The best controller for pc battery life is very good and is durable

their delivery persons are lair.

Honest Review
Marvellous Gamepad From Red Gear
First Impression was decent. Longer usage showed the flaws.

Redgear is on 🔥 after launching this gamepad😁
Product is nice.. works smooth
review:
Pros:  
Hassle-free connection.  
Sturdy to hold.  
Decent looking.  
Extra dongle.  
Rubberized sides.  
Overall great experience.  
  
Cons:  
Ungripped Analogs. ( They can be bought separately)  
D-pad moves all together, cannot smooth shift between buttons.  
Right trigger was like of shaky for me.  
Lack of space for dongle storage. Could loose it if unattended. (Maybe that's
why an extra one)  
  
Never the less, great responsive controller for a decent price.

After using it for a month, I can say it's a premium quality gamepad at this
price. I got it for 1050/- in a lightening deal. Keys feels really good and
clicks sound satisfying, and pressure keys for shooting and running are high
quality and works too good with any game e.g. GTA 5, The Witcher 3 etc.  
I had a wired Redgear gamepad before this but after 1 and half years of use
it's USB cable stopped responding from time to time, it would usually gets
malfunctioned or wouldn't connect at all on PC. So, I decided to go wireless
this time to avoid USB plug in and out every time I have to play. Response
time is real, as real as wired one, even if there's a difference you wouldn't
be noticing anything. It works from 10 feet distance and may be more, also
very comfortable in hands and weight is perfect, neither too light or heavy.
Vibration is fine, you might need to install drivers for that if you're not
using Win10.  
It has best battery life, I've only charged it for 3 times in one month
period. I'm not heavy gamer but i would still play 2-3 hours a day for 3-4
days a week. Still a good battery back-up and it charge-up really fast too, in
just 30 minutes or so.  
Over all a good deal, go for it if you're looking for a premium quality build
in low prices, it's the best one.

Going to buy a controller is very difficult as we have choose its features,
price and design too. This product is best for Gaming purposes to serve. It
has got many features. Firstly, the keys are smooth and works perfectly well.
Secondly ,it has got integrated force feedback which is very nice and cool.
Thirdly, the price is not that high. You won't regret buying this.



 Nice product nicely built keys are good charges well connectivity is superb
totally satisfied

Received it today, I'm Gonna write a described review after a week of
different test, for now hands on experience is below:-  
When i saw the box, well it seemslike small but the device inside is in a
perfect size which increases ease of access to all of the keys.  
  
This model is upgraded one and comes with 2 wireless receiver (idk what's the
point but i think if one stopped working or related scenario)  
  
Side of the gamepad has rubber coating with dramatically enhances the
stability in your hands  
  
Powerful force fedback indeed, no doubt in that  
  
If using on windows, it works like a Microsoft XBox Controller 😛 which is a
good this to adore though😁  
  
Provided cable is of okay-okay length, there is a CD along with to configure
it for force feedback  
  
Illuminated ABXY Keys😍 Looks charming.  
  
There is one thing i think could be improved, wgich is it's finishing, few
buttons and Z axis levers were wobbling in there fitting positions and their
finishing was not like the rest of the buttons or sticks.  
I will provide more information within a week, hit thanks if my review helped.
🙋  
  
Extra piece of advise, Do read the manual before using it.  
  
Some games me crash when this controller will be in sync, it's not the
controller's fault, all you have to do is, switch to different modes.  
(i.e. if you're on Xinput mode then just switch to DirecInput and wolla, this
works like a charm, in order to switch and detect in which mode it currently
is, you have to read manual 😁)
